snippet: Pakistani officials on Friday released an Indian border guard who was arrested after he accidentally crossed their de facto border in the disputed Himalayan territory of Kashmir, officials said.
abstract: Pakistani officials release Satyasheel Yadav, Indian border guard who was arrested after he accidentally crossed border in disputed Himalayan territory of Kashmir.
lead_paragraph: Pakistani officials on Friday released an Indian border guard who was arrested after he accidentally crossed their de facto border in the disputed Himalayan territory of Kashmir, officials said.

headline.main: Pakistan: Indian Border Guard Released After Brief Detention
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Indian Border Guard Released After Brief Detention
